price: 85. Béni soit donc Celui Qui a la royauté des cieux, de la terre et de ce qu’il y a entre eux, Qui détient la science de l’Heure, et vers Qui vous serez ramenés.
arabic: وَتَبَارَكَ ٱلَّذِي لَهُۥ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا وَعِندَهُۥ عِلۡمُ ٱلسَّاعَةِ وَإِلَيۡهِ تُرۡجَعُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: watabāraka alladhī lahu mul'ku al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wamā baynahumā waʿindahu ʿil'mu al-sāʿati wa-ilayhi tur'jaʿūna
